item.title: 随着人工智能需求的增长，Together AI 初创公司估值达 33 亿美元
item.description: 为用户提供人工智能计算服务的初创公司 Together AI 在 General Catalyst 领投的交易中从投资者手中筹集了 3.05 亿美元，使公司估值达到 33 亿美元；这是企业对人工智能需求依然强劲的一个信号。【原文：Startup Together AI, which provides users access to artificial intelligence computing, has raised $305 million from investors in deal led by General Catalyst, bringing the valuation of the company to $3.3 billion — a signal that corporate demand for AI is still strong.】

item.title: 欧洲央行马克鲁夫警告通货紧缩进程面临危险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）警告说，在严重的不确定性下，消费者价格增长放缓将带来危险。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf warned of dangers to the slowdown in consumer-price growth amid acute uncertainty.】

item.title: 对冲基金人才争夺战激战正酣，千禧年以 1 亿美元出价吸引团队加入
item.description: 在对冲基金巨头之间爆发的挖角投资组合经理 Chris Procaccini（48 岁）的战争中，行业传奇人物伊兹-英格兰德（Izzy Englander）出面取得了胜利。【原文：As the war to poach portfolio manager Chris Procaccini, 48, erupted among hedge fund giants, industry legend Izzy Englander intervened to secure a victory.】

item.title: 特朗普改弦易辙后，页岩气重振交易议程
item.description:
随着新政府改变美国对化石燃料的政策，钻探商们正在加紧整合。【原文：

Drillers are ramping up consolidation as the new administration changes US policy toward fossil fuels.

】

item.title: 贝森特称终止美国债务发行 "遥遥无期
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，考虑到目前的障碍，包括美联储的量化紧缩计划，任何提高长期国债在政府债务发行中所占比例的举措都还遥遥无期。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that any move to boost the share of longer-term Treasuries in government debt issuance is some ways off, given current hurdles that include the Federal Reserve’s quantitative tightening program.】

item.title: TikTok重返美国应用商店，数周的不确定性带来了缓冲
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，亚历山德拉-莱文（Alexandra Levine）将探讨 TikTok 在美国的前景如何受到质疑。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Alexandra Levine looks at how TikTok has been hurt by the questions surrounding its future in the US.】

item.title: 菲尔博士》在流媒体时代的品牌重塑举步维艰
item.description:
Merit TV 进入了一个拥挤的新闻网络领域。它能找到自己的受众吗？【原文：

Merit TV has entered a crowded field of news networks. Can it find its audience?

】

item.title: 如果关税威胁成为现实，美国消费者将面临 "贴纸冲击
item.description: 在一次例行新闻发布会上，洛杉矶港又迎来了一个稳定的货运量月，加州零售商协会负责人借此机会就过度监管和提高进口税对家庭预算的威胁发出警告。【原文：A routine press conference to tout another solid month of cargo volumes at the Port of Los Angeles turned into an opportunity for the head of the California Retailers Association to warn about overregulation and the threat of higher import taxes on household budgets.】

item.title: 在特朗普的压力下，欧洲正在寻求贸易协议
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们关注的是欧洲对贸易协议的希望，而不是贸易斗争。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at European hopes for trade deals rather than trade fights. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 退伍军人推动 SPAC IPO 反弹，寻求交易的热情高涨
item.description: 华尔街正准备迎接另一波由经验丰富的保荐人和首次保荐人发起的空头支票公司浪潮，这显示了这些公司上市工具的持久力，也让人们对更多的交易充满期待。【原文：Wall Street is gearing up for another wave of blank check companies from seasoned and first-time sponsors, showing the staying power of the vehicles to take companies public — and setting up expectations of more deals.】

item.title: Meta Platforms 连创历史新高，股票分拆指日可待
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司最近破纪录地连续上涨了 20 天，股价达到了投资者可能开始呼吁该公司自 2013 年上市以来首次拆分股票的水平。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc.’s recent record-breaking, 20-day rally propelled the share price to a level where investors may start calling on the company to split its stock for the first time since going public in 2013.】

item.title: 预测天气变暖，英国电价降至 2025 年低点
item.description: 由于暖锋临近，供暖需求减少，英国电力交易量达到今年最低水平。【原文：UK power is trading at the lowest level this year as a warm front approaches, reducing demand for heating.】

item.title: 马云重回公众视线，蚂蚁金服集团利润上升
item.description: 受益于投资收益，蚂蚁金服集团公司的季度利润飙升了 50 多倍，这对马云创立的中国金融科技巨头来说是一大利好。【原文：Ant Group Co.’s quarterly profit surged more than 50-fold after it benefited from an investment gain, a major boon for the Chinese fintech giant founded by Jack Ma.】

item.title: 世界其他地区正从美国市场流失大量房源
item.description: 欧洲和亚洲公司涌入美国股市的势头正在加快。【原文：The exodus of European and Asian companies to US stock markets is picking up steam.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为特朗普与中国和印度的交易之路将十分艰难
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收对等关税的最后期限临近，摩根士丹利的经济学家们发现，亚洲一些最大的经济体将很难及时与美国达成贸易协议。【原文：As the deadline approaches for President Donald Trump’s reciprocal tariffs, economists at Morgan Stanley found it will be difficult for some of Asia’s biggest economies to reach a trade deal with the US in time.】

item.title: 特朗普发表乌克兰言论，为东欧集会急刹车
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统对乌克兰政府的抨击破坏了对和平进程顺利进行的赌注，东欧资产令人眼花缭乱的涨势戛然而止。【原文：The dizzying rally in eastern European assets is coming to an abrupt halt as President Donald Trump’s outburst against the Ukrainian government unravels bets on a smooth peace process.】

item.title: 据说鹰橄榄球公司将就计划在纽约上市事宜与瑞银合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，全球最活跃的足球俱乐部投资者之一--鹰牌足球控股有限公司（Eagle Football Holdings Ltd. ）正与瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）合作，计划在纽约进行首次公开募股。【原文：Eagle Football Holdings Ltd., one of the most active investors in football clubs globally, is working with UBS Group AG on its planned initial public offering in New York, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 基金巨头贝莱德致力于联合公共和私人市场
item.description:
拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）通过简化股票和债券的交易流程，打造了全球最大的资产管理公司。对于更不透明的资产是否也能做到这一点？【原文：

Larry Fink built the world’s biggest asset manager by making access to stocks and bonds easy. Can the same be done with more opaque assets? 

】

item.title: 欧洲央行因过去政策的利息账单而出现创纪录亏损
item.description: 欧洲中央银行在 2024 年报告了创纪录的亏损，这是因为该行采取了激进的政策应对飙升的通胀和过去物价上涨疲软的时期。【原文：The European Central Bank reported a record loss in 2024, a result of its aggressive policy responses to surging inflation and past periods of weak price gains.】

item.title: 印度因资金紧张取消 30 亿美元国债销售
item.description: 在印度银行系统现金紧缩的情况下，印度央行在周四的拍卖中没有接受任何 91 天和 182 天国库券的投标。【原文：India’s central bank did not accept any bids for 91 and 182-day treasury bills in an auction Thursday amid a cash squeeze in the nation’s banking system.】

item.title: 象牙海岸与法国在军队撤离之际保持部分军事关系
item.description: 法国国防部长塞巴斯蒂安-勒科努（Sebastien Lecornu）周四在首都阿比让表示，随着法国军队开始撤出在西非国家的一个军事基地，象牙海岸和法国将继续在军事训练领域开展合作。【原文：Ivory Coast and France will continue to cooperate in the area of military training as French troops start pulling out of an army base in the West African nation, France Defense Minister Sebastien Lecornu said in Abidjan, the capital on Thursday.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴营收超出预期，卷土重来迹象明显
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团公布了一年多来最快的收入增长速度，反映了其商业业务的好转以及在人工智能这一关键领域的长足进步。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. posted its fastest pace of revenue growth in more than a year, reflecting a turnaround in its commerce business and big strides into the critical field of AI.】

item.title: 中国抨击美国修改概况介绍，将重点放在贸易限制上
item.description: 中国抨击了美国国务院对其亚洲国家概况介绍所做的修改，称批评北京经济行为的更新内容歪曲了事实。【原文：China slammed changes made by the US State Department to its fact sheet on the Asian nation, describing the update that criticizes Beijing’s economic practices as misrepresenting the truth.】

item.title: 卡塔尔在公布预算赤字数月后出售美元债券
item.description: 卡塔尔正在发行基准规模的美元债券，利用其作为最安全的新兴市场信贷之一的声誉，帮助填补部分由石油和天然气价格下跌造成的预算缺口。【原文：Qatar is marketing a benchmark-sized dollar-bond issue, banking on its reputation as one of the safest emerging-market credits to help plug a budget gap caused in part by falling oil and gas prices.】

item.title: 特朗普上任首月交易员放弃 "美国优先 "赌注
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的第二个任期已经过去了一个月，从股票、美元到比特币，投资者在他 11 月获胜后参与的许多交易的兴奋情绪正在消退。【原文：A month into President Donald Trump’s second term, the euphoria is fading around many of the trades that investors piled into after his November victory, from stocks to the dollar to Bitcoin.】

item.title: 美股抗冲击能力升至大流行前水平
item.description: 衡量 S&P 500 指数抵御引发恐惧的头条新闻和意外政策声明的能力，是自 19 世纪科威德大流行之前以来最强的。【原文：A measure of the S&P 500 Index’s ability to brush off fear-inducing headlines and surprise policy announcements is the strongest since before the Covid-19 pandemic.】

item.title: 印度将首席经济顾问任期延长两年
item.description: 印度政府将首席经济顾问阿南塔-纳格斯瓦兰（V. Anantha Nageswaran）的任期延长两年，排除了他竞争央行副行长职位的可能性。【原文：India’s government extended the term of Chief Economic Adviser V. Anantha Nageswaran by two years, ruling him out as a possible contender to take the post of central bank deputy governor.】

item.title: 米佐塔基斯称，尽管希腊地震令人担忧，但仍可安全游览希腊
item.description: 希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯（Kyriakos Mitsotakis）表示，希腊是一个 "安全 "的旅游国家，他淡化了人们对圣托里尼岛近期地震活动将进一步恶化的担忧。【原文：Greece is a “safe” country for tourists to visit, Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said, downplaying concerns that recent seismic activity on the island of Santorini will worsen.】

item.title: 安哥拉政府在可能出售欧洲债券前争取投资者
item.description: 在今年晚些时候可能出售欧元债券之前，安哥拉目前正在吸引从中东到欧洲和美国的投资者，以测试投资者的情绪。【原文：Angola is currently courting investors from the Middle East to Europe and the US to test investor sentiment before a possible eurobond sale later this year.】

item.title: 勃肯司得（Birkenstock）销售额在高端木屐热潮和亚洲扩张中飙升
item.description: Birkenstock Holding Plc 公司称，其高端凉鞋和木屐的销售在最近一个季度加速增长，从而推动了这家德国制鞋公司向投资者展示其时尚性的努力。【原文：Birkenstock Holding Plc said sales of its high-end sandals and clogs accelerated in its most recent quarter, bolstering the German shoe company’s efforts to show investors it can stay fashionable.】
